SELECT A.MTG_ID, A.MTG_NM, A.MTG_MTR_CN, A.MTG_SN, A.MTG_CO, DATE_FORMAT(A.MTG_DE,'%Y-%m-%d') MTG_DE, A.MTG_PLACE, A.MTG_BEGIN_TM, A.MTG_END_TM, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID FROM COMTNMTGINFO A WHERE 1=1
